title: EDA
name: Early Date Acceptance
definition: Indicates that the customer agrees to accept an earlier due date on their confirmation notice than the desired due date requested if the provider can accommodate an earlier date.
fieldNotes: Population of this field specifies that the customer agrees to accept billing based on the provider due date returned on the confirmation notice.
Population of this field will not result in expedite charges being billed.
usageNotes:
Prohibited when the EXP field is populated. 
Prohibited when the ASC-EC field is populated. 
Otherwise optional.
